name: Our Own Maneki Neko
description:
I took the basic idea from Maneki Neko or known as a Lucky charm Cat
by most East Asian people and a few of Southeast Asia subcuture, which is believed to bring some wealth and luck for their owner, neither for their business nor a personal charm. 

But, the main concept for this artwork itself isn't mean to give everyone who has art piece to have any 'supertitious' lucky charm for themself, such as to keep the charm and waiting for miracle from an unknown sources. 

In contrary, my Maneki Neko version was made to increase people social awareness.
It means that everyone could be a Maneki Neko for another people, as a helping hand to keep themself survive togethwe in this Covid 19 critical situations, even it didn't always mean to a financial status or money but it also can be shown as a moral support nor to work together to solving any problem that can be done for many people life , or a small things such as an idea. 

I believe that we all need a lucky charm to keep ourself safe and health.
But we can be a helping hand for another people too, as their good luck. 

Cause i believe a luck was never there without any reasons, but it oftwn builded by a good things we did for the other.
